backend/main.mo: Defines data models for salons, bookings, users, images, and includes authorization and storage mixins plus initial Swiss salon seeding logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes, affected files, components, and test IDs for compliance.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptive summaries of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base variables and themes including dark mode and OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large standalone UI implementation containing cities, distance simulation, categories, demo artists, and booking logic for the V70 interface.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the AuthHeader component.
Empty placeholder file for the CreateSalonForm component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MemberCard component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder file for the MonopolyModeSwitch component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MotionButton component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the PremiumBadge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for the ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder file for the ProSalonWizard component.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder file for the ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the RevenueChart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder file for the SalonListSection component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the VipDashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and custom animation keyframes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style aura text for a salon based on category, type, tags, and city using predefined templates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current version, architectural resets, frontend/back‑end direction, and known issues.
